name: Elegant Euphoria
short_description: A romantic and luxurious wedding package with personalized details.
details_description: Our Elegant Euphoria package includes a dedicated wedding planner, venue selection assistance, floral arrangements, catering, and more. We'll ensure every element of your wedding reflects your unique style and love story.

name: Whimsical Wonderland
short_description: A magical birthday celebration with enchanting decorations, fun activities, and delectable treats.
details_description: The Whimsical Wonderland package offers custom-themed decor, entertainment options, a delicious cake, and party favors. Let us create a whimsical atmosphere for your special day.

name: Timeless Romance
short_description: A romantic and intimate anniversary celebration to cherish your years together.
details_description: Our Timeless Romance package includes a private venue, candlelit dinner, personalized decor, and a photographer to capture the moments. Celebrate your love story in style.

name: Sparkling Soiree
short_description: A glamorous and lively gathering to celebrate your engagement with family and friends.
details_description: The Sparkling Soiree package offers elegant decor, a dance floor, catering, and a photographer to capture the joyous moments. Let's make your engagement party a night to remember.

name: Golden Farewell
short_description: A heartfelt and memorable retirement celebration to honor a cherished colleague.
details_description: Our Golden Farewell package includes personalized tributes, a farewell speech setup, catering, and a photo booth for capturing memories. Give your colleague a golden send-off.

name: Sweet Beginnings
short_description: A charming and cozy baby shower to welcome the newest addition to the family.
details_description: The Sweet Beginnings package offers adorable decor, fun games, a dessert table, and a keepsake for the parents-to-be. Celebrate this special moment with sweetness and joy.

name: Glamour Makeovers
short_description: Indulge in a pampering session with professional hair and makeup artists for a picture-perfect look.
details_description: Our Glamour Makeovers service offers a complete makeover experience, including hairstyling, makeup application, and skincare consultation. Our skilled artists will enhance your natural beauty, ensuring you look and feel your best for your special event.

name: Solemn Send-off
short_description: A dignified funeral service to honor and remember a loved one.
details_description: Our Solemn Send-off service offers a dignified farewell, including a beautiful memorial setup, flower arrangements, and support for grieving family and friends. We aim to create a respectful and meaningful ceremony to honor the departed.
